name: @vectara/create-ui
description: A tool for creating a Vectara-powered app

scripts.dev:search: cd apps/search && cp ../../sampleConfigurations/search-configuration.ts ./src/configuration.ts && npm install && npm run start
scripts.dev:searchSummary: cd apps/searchSummary && cp ../../sampleConfigurations/searchSummary-configuration.ts ./src/configuration.ts && npm install && npm run start
scripts.dev:qa: cd apps/questionAndAnswer && cp ../../sampleConfigurations/questionAndAnswer-configuration.ts ./src/configuration.ts && npm install && npm run start

author: Deryk DeGuzman
